mapper.select: SELECT config.config_id, config.config_rank, config.create_time, IF(LEFT(goods.goods_cover_image, 1) = '/', CONCAT('/file', goods.goods_cover_image), goods.goods_cover_image) AS goodsCoverImage, goods.goods_name FROM goods_config AS config CROSS JOIN goods ON config.goods_id = goods.goods_id WHERE config.config_id = #{id} AND config.config_type = #{type} AND config.is_deleted = 0

SELECT config.config_id, config.config_rank, config.create_time, IF(LEFT(goods.goods_cover_image, 1) = '/', CONCAT('/file', goods.goods_cover_image), goods.goods_cover_image) AS goodsCoverImage, goods.goods_name FROM goods_config AS config CROSS JOIN goods ON config.goods_id = goods.goods_id WHERE config.config_type = #{type} AND config.is_deleted = 0

SELECT IF(LEFT(goods.goods_cover_image, 1) = '/', CONCAT('/file', goods.goods_cover_image), goods.goods_cover_image) AS goodsCoverImage, goods.goods_name, goods.selling_price FROM goods_config AS config CROSS JOIN goods ON config.goods_id = goods.goods_id WHERE config.config_type = #{type} AND config.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY config.config_rank DESC
